mapper.sql: INFO_ID, BOOK_ID, BOOK_NAME, CERTIFICATE_NO, ENT_ID, ENT_NAME_CHN, SHIP_ID, SHIP_NAME_CHN, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, BUSI_TYPE, SERVICE_TYPE, CERTI_STATE, TMP_FLAG, ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO, CREATOR, ORG_ID, CREATE_DATE, OPER_DATE, STATE, NOTE, CHECK_ORG, SERVICE_AREA
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CERTIFICATE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CERTIFICATE (INFO_ID, BOOK_ID, BOOK_NAME, CERTIFICATE_NO, ENT_ID, ENT_NAME_CHN, SHIP_ID, SHIP_NAME_CHN, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, BUSI_TYPE, SERVICE_TYPE, CERTI_STATE, TMP_FLAG, ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO, CREATOR, ORG_ID, CREATE_DATE, OPER_DATE, STATE, NOTE, CHECK_ORG, SERVICE_AREA) values (#{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certiState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INFO_ID,

mapper.update:
update CERTIFICATE
INFO_ID = #{record.infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BOOK_ID = #{record.bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOK_NAME = #{record.bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATE_NO = #{record.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_ID = #{record.entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_NAME_CHN = #{record.entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_ID = #{record.shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_NAME_CHN = #{record.shipNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFF_DATE = #{record.effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXP_DATE = #{record.expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSI_TYPE = #{record.busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_TYPE = #{record.serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTI_STATE = #{record.certiState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMP_FLAG = #{record.tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{record.oriCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPER_DATE = #{record.operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_ORG = #{record.checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_AREA = #{record.serviceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CERTIFICATE set INFO_ID = #{record.infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BOOK_ID = #{record.bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOK_NAME = #{record.bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATE_NO = #{record.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENT_ID = #{record.entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENT_NAME_CHN = #{record.entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_ID = #{record.shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_NAME_CHN = #{record.shipNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{record.effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{record.expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUSI_TYPE = #{record.busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{record.serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTI_STATE = #{record.certiState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMP_FLAG = #{record.tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{record.oriCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPER_DATE = #{record.operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_ORG = #{record.checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_AREA = #{record.serviceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CERTIFICATE
BOOK_ID = #{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOK_NAME = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATE_NO = #{certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_ID = #{entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_NAME_CHN = #{entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_ID = #{shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_NAME_CHN = #{shipNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSI_TYPE = #{busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTI_STATE = #{certiState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMP_FLAG = #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{oriCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_ORG = #{checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_AREA = #{serviceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CERTIFICATE set BOOK_ID = #{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOK_NAME = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATE_NO = #{certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENT_ID = #{entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENT_NAME_CHN = #{entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_ID = #{shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_NAME_CHN = #{shipNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUSI_TYPE = #{busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTI_STATE = #{certiState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMP_FLAG = #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{oriCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_ORG = #{checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_AREA = #{serviceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
update CERTIFICATE set CERTI_STATE = 3, OPER_DATE = sysdate where CERTI_STATE = 1 AND TO_CHAR(EXP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')<TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: select a.INFO_ID, a.BOOK_ID, a.BOOK_NAME, a.CERTIFICATE_NO, a.ENT_ID, a.ENT_NAME_CHN, a.SHIP_ID, a.SHIP_NAME_CHN, a.EFF_DATE, a.EXP_DATE, a.BUSI_TYPE, a.SERVICE_TYPE, a.CERTI_STATE, a.TMP_FLAG, a.ORI_CERTIFICATE_NO, a.CREATOR, a.ORG_ID, a.CREATE_DATE, a.OPER_DATE, a.STATE, a.NOTE, a.CHECK_ORG, a.SERVICE_AREA from (select c.*, row_number() over(partition by ship_id order by eff_date desc) as rn FROM CERTIFICATE c where c.SHIP_ID IN ((SELECT DISTINCT SHIP_ID FROM CERTIFICATE T WHERE T.BOOK_ID = 'TH1017' MINUS SELECT DISTINCT SHIP_ID FROM CERTIFICATE T WHERE T.BOOK_ID = 'TH1017' AND T.CERTI_STATE = '1'))) a where rn = 1 and to_char(a.exp_date, 'YYYYMM') >= TO_CHAR(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'YYYYMM') and a.certi_state = '3' UNION select b.* from certificate b where b.certi_state = '1' and b.book_id = 'TH1017' UNION select e.* from certificate e where e.info_id in (select to_number(d.ori_certificate_no) from certificate d where d.ori_certificate_no in (select to_char(a.info_id) from (select c.*, row_number() over(partition by ship_id order by eff_date desc) as rn FROM CERTIFICATE c where c.SHIP_ID IN ((SELECT DISTINCT SHIP_ID FROM CERTIFICATE T WHERE T.BOOK_ID = 'TH1017' MINUS SELECT DISTINCT SHIP_ID FROM CERTIFICATE T WHERE T.BOOK_ID = 'TH1017' AND T.CERTI_STATE = '1'))) a where rn = 1 and to_char(a.exp_date, 'YYYYMM') >= TO_CHAR(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'YYYYMM') and a.certi_state = '2') and to_char(d.eff_date, 'YYYYMM') >= TO_CHAR(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'YYYYMM'));
